facebook.title: Analema Group calls for Visual Developer
facebook.summary:
Call for a Visual Developer.

The Analema group are seeking a talented visual developer / graphics programmer who can help to take the KIMA project to the next level. We are looking for someone to take the lead on the visual development of KIMA in order to

Call for a Visual Developer

We are looking for a visual developer / graphic programmer able to help us develop further from the current stage and program stunning visuals for KIMA project by the ANALEMA group. 

Timeline: Immediate start, event in March 2
